message.body: Will do love. You and your piece were amazing. So proud of and happy for you. Have a great trip babe. Xxooo
Im on the flight!!!!! Going HOME
So good :) :) :) so glad :) :) :) but I miss you already Merther
Martha! What happened?? What kind of accident?? Going to call you in a couple hours when it's later. I am so sorry and hope you're ok! Sending you so so
So concerned about if you're ok. Thinking of you so much.

Hey Mel, everything's ok. Minnesota roads on a Friday night... I had to swerve out of the way and lost control for a while and ran into a road sign to stop. I only bumped my head and messed my back up. Really minor and now I have pills!
Don't be too concerned. I just really wanted your loving arms and support in that moment.
Oh babe. Wish I could hug you so much. Sounds like it was such a scary experience. Hope your back is ok. I know back pain and it's rough. Going thru it r
ight now - bring home pills! ;) love you. Call you later. Xxoo
